page.title: 01Review of the area
page.content: The area is situated to the NNW of Blackburn. It is dominated by two steep sided ridges, Revidge in the South and Ramsgreave / Mellor in the North, along both of which lie housing developments. Three major trunk roads cross the area providing good access to neighbouring towns and the M6 Motorway .Despite a good network of roads the area has many quiet places to spend a little time wandering the many footpaths and minor roads. The route from Mellor to the Top of Ramsgreave provides excellent views, in fine weather, of the scenic Ribble Valley to the North and the Longridge fells beyond, to the South the outskirts of Blackburn. The area has throughout a contrast of housing development from very old cottages to modern housing estates to luxury homes.
